ComicInfo.Summary:
Sisters Rainbow (the bookish one) and Jonna (the bafflingly strong and near-invulnerable one) have been wandering the barren, monster-infested no man's land looking for their missing father for what seems like forever. Mysterious warriors Gor and Nomi—who they met last issue—have given them shelter and the hope of community, but when their hidden camp is attacked by a giant beast, Gor and Nomi show the girls a thing or two about fighting monsters! Or is it Jonna who has some lessons to teach?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Chris Samnee & Matthew Wilson | 1 | B | Cover B | Zander Cannon | 2 |
